titleStmt.title: The true church of Christ exposed to the view of all sober Christians, from the Word of God, sound reason, and the ancient fathers / by James Salgado, a Spaniard, a converted priest.
titleStmt.author: Salgado, James, fl. 1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.B. for the Author,
